name: Renewable Energy Group, Inc.
description: Renewable Energy Group, Inc. (REG) is a leading provider of renewable fuels and the largest producer of biodiesel in North America. Founded in 1996 and headquartered in Ames, Iowa, REG is committed to creating a sustainable energy future through the production of advanced biofuels. The company produces biomass-based diesel and renewable diesel, which significantly reduce greenhouse gas emissions compared to traditional fossil fuels. REG focuses on innovation in the renewable energy sector, utilizing cutting-edge technology to convert various feedstocks, including waste cooking oil and animal fats, into cleaner-burning fuels. With an extensive network of biorefineries across the United States, REG supplies its products to customers in the transportation, industrial, and heating sectors. The company also emphasizes sustainability by investing in research and development to enhance biofuel production processes and promote the use of renewable energy. REG is not only dedicated to producing renewable fuels but also actively engages in community development and environmental stewardship. Through its initiatives, REG aims to provide a cleaner energy alternative and drive the transition towards a sustainable energy economy.

seo.meta_title: Renewable Energy Group, Inc. | Leading Provider of Renewable Fuels
seo.meta_description: Explore Renewable Energy Group, Inc., the largest producer of biodiesel in North America committed to sustainable energy through advanced biofuel solutions.

faq.question: What does Renewable Energy Group do?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group produces renewable fuels, primarily biodiesel and renewable diesel, from various feedstocks.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Renewable Energy Group?
faq.answer: Cynthia J. Martin is the CEO of Renewable Energy Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Renewable Energy Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group is headquartered in Ames, Iowa, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Renewable Energy Group?
faq.answer: The main products of Renewable Energy Group are biodiesel and renewable diesel.

faq.question: When was Renewable Energy Group founded?
faq.answer: Renewable Energy Group was founded in 1996.
